```{R, fig.width = 5, fig.height = 5}
n <- 1e4
M <- matrix(runif(2*n,-1,1),ncol=2)
M <- cbind(M,sqrt(M[,1]^2+M[,2]^2))
plot(M[,1],M[,2], col=rgb(1,.38,0, alpha = 0.2), pch=19, cex=.2,
     xlab='', ylab='', tck=F, axes=F)
```
